title: Desert Song
lyrics: Desert Song
Brooke Ligertwood Tempo - 120 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
This is my prayer in the desert
When all that's with - in me feels dry
This is my prayer in my hunger and need
My God is the God who pro - vides
VERSE 2
This is my prayer in the fire
In weakness or trial or pain
There is a faith proved of more worth than gold
So refine me Lord through the flame
CHORUS
I will bring praise I will bring praise
No weapon formed against me shall re - main
I will re - joice I will de - clare
God is my victory and He is here
INSTRUMENTAL 1
VERSE 3
This is my prayer in the battle
When triumph is still on its way
I am a conqu'ror and co - heir with Christ
So firm on His promise I'll stand
BRIDGE
All of my life in ev’ry season You are still God
I have a reason to sing I have a reason to worship
INSTRUMENTAL 2
VERSE 4
This is my prayer in the harvest
When favour and providence flow
I know I'm filled to be emptied again
The seed I've re - ceived I will sow
CCLI Song # 5060793

chords: | Bm A | G D | Bm A | G |
||: Bm A | G D | Bm A | G :||

Desert Song
Key - D
Brooke Ligertwood Tempo - 120 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
Bm A G D
This is my prayer in the desert
Bm A G D
When all that's with - in me feels dry
Bm A G D
This is my prayer in my hunger and need
Bm A G
My God is the God who pro - vides
VERSE 2
Bm A G D
This is my prayer in the fire
Bm A G D
In weakness or trial or pain
Bm A G D
There is a faith proved of more worth than gold
Bm D/F# G
So refine me Lord through the flame
CHORUS
D A
I will bring praise I will bring praise
G D
No weapon formed against me shall re - main
A/C# A Bm
I will re - joice I will de - clare
G D/A A Bm
God is my victory and He is here
INSTRUMENTAL 1
| Bm A | G D | Bm A | G |
VERSE 3
Bm A G D
This is my prayer in the battle
Bm A G D
When triumph is still on its way
Bm A G D
I am a conqu'ror and co - heir with Christ
Bm D/F# G
So firm on His promise I'll stand
BRIDGE
D Bm
All of my life in ev’ry season You are still God
A G D
I have a reason to sing I have a reason to worship
INSTRUMENTAL 2
||: Bm A | G D | Bm A | G :||
VERSE 4
Bm A G
This is my prayer in the harvest
Bm A G
When favour and providence flow
Bm A G
I know I'm filled to be emptied again
Bm A G
The seed I've re - ceived I will sow
